title: Inspired Upbeat Music
description: Get ready to elevate the happiness quotient of your game-making project with Inspired Upbeat! This delightful corporate-style music is all about spreading cheerful vibes.
longDescription:
Audio Preview 1

Audio Preview 2





﻿note :- All the music tracks I have composed are created from scratch. My artist name is Meraj Melody. You can visit my YouTube channel to see how I create music from scratch.If you need verification of this music package and how I composed everything, I will happily provide you with a video recording of each individual music creation process. As a musician dedicated to producing original music, I ensure that I do not use any third-party samples or AI tools in my compositions. This is to preserve the originality of my work and avoid potential legal issues in the future.


I am a music composer and sound designer, and I work with a team in a small audio studio in our local market. I can guarantee you that we don't use any AI in our projects because it would destroy the originality. You can check out the preview on YouTube to see how I create music and sound effects from scratch.


Here is my music composition process:- https://youtu.be/PrynlgTWsdQ


"Due to the marketplace flooding with AI-generated content, I often get questions about whether my music is AI-generated. I am happy to provide all the necessary evidence that my music is not AI-generated content; it is fully made from scratch."



Get ready for an incredible collection of 10 lively upbeat tracks, complete with a mix of soft and hard rhymes. Crafted specifically for in-game background music (BGM), these infectious tunes seamlessly loop, ensuring a continuous and immersive experience.

When you purchase this package, you gain full permission to use these beats for any project you have in mindâ€”whether it's games, software, animations, or anything else that ignites your creativity! Feel free to sample, pitch up, or pitch down the beats, allowing you to add your own unique touch and create something truly extraordinary. The possibilities are endless!

but note that you are forbidden to put this music into the copyright content id system or redistribute music to a music distributor company.


Update 1-28-2024 (YouTube content id disable )

You will not receive copyright claims on YouTube when using this music, as it is not registered with YouTube's Content ID system. If you do receive a false claim, please contact me immediately.

1) Water Farm

2) Last Zone

3) Wind Day

4) Tree Land

5) The White Sky

6) Sky Explore

7) Road Trip

8) Night Star

9) Morning Sky

10) Bright Wave
